articles.title: A streamer is staying live for as long as people keep subscribing - The Verge
articles.description: Ludwig Ahgren is one of the biggest streamers on Twitch, and he’s keeping his stream live for as long as viewers keep subscribing to his channel.
articles.content:
Every time you sub, Ludwig Ahgren has to stream for 10 more seconds
